reviews.label: Your Unforgettable
reviews.heading: Guest Experiences
reviews.subtitle: See why our guests consistently share outstanding feedback across all platforms.
reviews.booking_description: Discover Sipadan Kapalai Dive Resort in Semporna, Sabah, Malaysia—a legendary destination above crystal-clear waters, offering world-class diving and three decades of iconic hospitality. Book your unforgettable island escape today!

items.name: Michael M
items.review: This is our second visit and we love everything about the resort. Staff is great, rooms are really nice and the tub is great for warming up after a dive. The dive center is top notch with great guides (good evening karaoke too!) Food is fine, but could improve.

items.name: Rebecca K
items.review: My expectations were low when booking this due to previous average reviews. But I was pleasantly surprised. This place is stunning! We saw turtles around the overwater villas everyday as well as so many schools of fish. Highly recommend this place!

items.name: Chinwong69
items.review: Stayed at the resort for my dive trip. From pick up at the airport till transfer to the airport on the last day, the service was reasonably good from the different staff. The accomodation was tidy and importantly, well maintained.

items.name: Cswanston
items.review: We had the most amazing 5 days there as a family of 4 with 2 rooms. The place is even more beautiful than the photographs and just strolling along the walkways you see so much wildlife.

items.name: Werner G
items.review: A diving resort with great standardized processes. The diving center is super functional with a super friendly team. The artificial house reef is great and there is always something to see. Sleeping comfort in Villa 19 is great. The food is OK and the people are super nice.

items.name: Lankylee
items.review: Perfect place to chill out and dive surroundings. Sipadan is accessible. Resort without diving is already fantastic. It is an unbeatable combination with a well run diving outfit. Rates are cheap considering what you get. There is a marine police at one corner of large resort.

items.name: mypassionmyobsession
items.review: This is heaven on earth. If you're a diver, this is one of the top diving site in the world. Even if you're not, I would highly recommend for you to start taking lesson and get your license. It's worth it! The food is delicious. Bit spicy for those who doesn't take any spice.

items.name: Ferry R
items.review: If diving is your passion then you must have Kapalai in your diving checklist! But if you're not then don't worry because the place also is great for those who wants to escape the hustle and bustle. Spacious room and very serene. The food were great and the staffs are very helpful. Take a break and go Kapalai!

items.name: Lee Meng
items.review: Had a relaxing 4D3N surrounded with awesome view and lots of turtles and fish could be seen from the chalet. Resort staff are welcoming, approachable and helpful. Food provided was pleasantly prepared. However, the public toilet need thorough cleaning & refurbishment, wifi to be made available, more lighting along all the walkways at night.

items.name: Man Chung
items.review: The sea was so clear. Sea turtles can be seen from the balcony every night. very nice diving coaches. Highly recommended.

items.name: Chiu
items.review: Good resort for holiday, highly recommend.I had a very good experience in the resort, clean and safe. Overall is good.

items.name: Rachel
items.review: The unique geographical location is unmatched by any other hotel. The room has a terrace where you can soak in the bath, view the sea, and daydream. The environment is truly perfect; those who love the sea will adore it.

items.name: Mohd Lutfi
items.review: Room - spacious., have 1 queen size & 1 single for std room Food - a lots. One of the chalet that provide lots of food. View - masha ALLAH... So beautiful Safety - have esscom that patrol daily basis of every chalet Looking forward to come again

items.name: KSPG
items.review: Nice environment, extremely clean emeralds colour sea water, though the sandy beach is small but is white beach and good for photo taking. Consider big compound area for visitors to walk around, no daily tourists visit which keep the area with better privacy.

pearl.title: Pearl Island Resort
pearl.description: Located beside Bohey Dulang National Park, this new luxury retreat offers unrivaled access to adventure. Hike for breathtaking panoramic views of the mountains, sea, and sky, then relax in your tropical Semporna haven.

safety.description: 在我们安全的环境中放松；警惕的安全措施确保您的安心。

reviews.label: 您的难忘
reviews.heading: 客人体验
reviews.subtitle: 了解为什么我们的客人在所有平台上都一致分享优秀的反馈。
reviews.booking_description: 发现位于沙巴州山打根仙本那的诗巴丹卡帕莱潜水度假村——一个位于清澈海水之上的传奇目的地，提供世界一流的潜水和三十年的标志性热情好客。立即预订您难忘的岛屿逃亡之旅！

items.name: Michael M
items.review: 这是我们的第二次访问，我们喜欢度假村的一切。员工很棒，房间真的很不错，浴缸非常适合在潜水后取暖。潜水中心一流，有出色的导游（还有很好的晚间卡拉OK！）食物还不错，但可能会有所改进。

items.name: Rebecca K
items.review: 由于之前的普通评论，我对预订时的期望很低。但我惊喜万分。这个地方太棒了！我们每天都在水上别墅周围看到海龟，还有许多鱼群。强烈推荐这个地方！

items.name: Chinwong69
items.review: 为我的潜水旅行住在度假村。从机场接送到最后一天的机场转移，来自不同员工的服务相当不错。住宿整洁，重要的是维护良好。

items.name: Cswanston
items.review: 我们在那里作为4人家庭的2间房间里度过了最美好的5天。这个地方比照片还要美丽，沿着走道漫步，您会看到很多野生动物。

items.name: Werner G
items.review: 一个潜水度假村，具有很好的标准化流程。潜水中心超级实用，团队超级友好。人工房屋礁很棒，总是有东西可看。别墅19的睡眠舒适度很好。食物还不错，人们超级友好。

items.name: Lankylee
items.review: 在周围放松和潜水的完美地点。诗巴丹容易到达。没有潜水的度假村已经很棒了。这是一个无与伦比的组合，拥有一个管理良好的潜水机构。考虑到你得到的东西，费率很便宜。度假村的一个角落里有一支海警。

items.name: mypassionmyobsession
items.review: 这是人间天堂。如果您是潜水员，这是世界上顶级潜水地点之一。即使您不是，我也会强烈建议您开始上课并获得执照。这是值得的！食物很美味。对于那些不吃辛辣食物的人来说有点辛辣。

items.name: Ferry R
items.review: 如果潜水是您的热情，那么您必须在您的潜水清单中有卡帕莱！但如果您没有，请不要担心，因为这个地方对于那些想逃离喧嚣的人来说也很棒。宽敞的房间和非常宁静。食物很棒，员工非常乐于助人。休息一下，去卡帕莱吧！

items.name: Lee Meng
items.review: 在度假村周围有4天3晚的放松。从小屋可以看到很多海龟和鱼。度假村员工热情、平易近人且乐于助人。提供的食物令人满意。但公共厕所需要彻底清洁和翻新，应提供无线网络，晚上所有走道上应有更多照明。

items.name: Man Chung
items.review: 大海非常清澈。从阳台每晚都能看到海龟。非常好的潜水教练。强烈推荐。

items.name: Chiu
items.review: 假期很好的度假村，强烈推荐。我在度假村有过很好的经历，干净安全。总体来说不错。

items.name: Rachel
items.review: 独特的地理位置无与伦比。房间里有一个露台，您可以在那里泡澡、观海景和白日梦。环境真的很完美；那些喜欢大海的人会喜欢它。

items.name: Mohd Lutfi
items.review: 房间——宽敞。有1张床王和1张单人床标准房间 食物——很多。提供很多食物的小屋之一。景观——太美了！安全——有esscom每天巡逻每个小屋 期待再来

items.name: KSPG
items.review: 环境优美，大海颜色干净翠绿，虽然沙滩很小，但是白沙滩，适合拍照。考虑为游客散步的大院落，没有日常游客访问，使该区域拥有更好的隐私。

sipadan.title: 卡帕莱度假村
sipadan.description: 在我们独特的热带度假村体验天堂。原始海滩、清澈见底的海水和世界级设施在这个隐秘的岛屿庇护所等着您。

pearl.title: 珍珠岛度假村
pearl.description: 位于珍珠岛国家公园旁，这个新的豪华度假胜地提供无与伦比的冒险机会。登山欣赏群山、大海和天空的壮观全景，然后在您的热带仙本那天堂放松身心。
